ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Xaml Styling</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Using garish colors to demonstrate Xaml styling of the chart, Axis, grid lines, tick lines and common series types.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Almost any element in SciChart is stylable in Xaml and most parts of the chart are templated. You can easily set background, grid-line, axis label, viewport background and chart series colors in Xaml.</Run>
